name: 曾恕銘
objective: This course provide in-depth knowledge about state-of-art transmission technology. So students can read related technical papers and conduct related research. This is not an introductory course.
schedule:
1.　　mobile communication fundamentals
2.　　CDMA fundamental
3.　　Data detection in for DS/CDMA
4.　　MIMO detection
5.　　IDMA
6.　　OFDMA
7.　　UWB
8.　　Zigbee
9.　　Traffic Theories (optional)
scorePolicy:
口頭報告(1.講義部分章節或2.三年內相關paper含程式): 30%
Final exam (close): 70%
